response.message: Thanks for having me on guys, it was fun!
can't say that the topic of the cast relates to me but Powdermilk references do. They're a real hot item.
06-03-13 -- is it 6 March 2013, or 3 July 2013 (or 13 March 2006)?
Are you all shy people who need Powdermilk to do what you need to do? :-)
Yes, Tina. However, I go a step further and put Ketchup on my biscuits - its natural mellowing agents combine to give me the strength to do what needs to be done without being a jerk about it.
Those biscuits are pretty good. I have them all the time at the Professional Organization of English Majors meetings in the Lutheran church basement.

The comments around trading development for beer, reminds me of the Ballmer Peak XKCD.....

http://xkcd.com/323/
What is the link to the ted talk mentioned in the episode?
